name: Astro bounce
description:
Simple game developed for the "Holistic3D Game Jam 2022". The topic of the Jam is "Well, that wasn't supposed to happen".

The story of the game is:

  • The rocket is on fire! 
  • Of course, it is a rocket.
  • No! Not the engines, the astronaut modules!!!
  • Well, that was not supposed to happen!
  • Commander, we need your help to save as many astronauts as possible in 5 minutes. Bring them to the rover so we can drive them to safety.

How to play:

  • The game will display your performance after 5 minutes. We do not expect you to save all the astronauts (it is impossible)
  • Use Left arrow or A to move the trampoline to the left.
  • User Right arrow or D to move the trampoline to the right.
  • You can go faster by using the keys 1,2,3,4,5. Use at your own risk ;)
  • Click spacebar to start a new game or after game over to restart.

Credits:

The music is "Space trip" by YGVR https://tunetank.com/tracks/3906-space-trip/

The 3D models are from Kenney.nl space kit: https://kenney.nl/assets/space-kit

This game was inspired by the old DOS game I played in my childhood Bouncing Babies.
